title: Do We Worry Too Much About Teen Sex?
teaser: Do media reports about teen sexting, “rainbow parties” and “sex bracelets” keep you up at night? They’re probably urban legends , according to Joy Cardin’s guest author, who says we worry more than we need to about the sexuality of teens. Meanwhile, rates of teen pregnancy and sexually transmitted disease are declining. She examines why we still have these fears, and where they come from.
